title: Create Service Request Tool
description: Create emergency or standard service request

function.name: create_service_request
function.description: Create a service request for HVAC repair or maintenance. Use this when customer reports a problem (no heat, no AC, system not working, etc.). Handles emergency qualification, technician assignment, and lead creation.

address.description: Full service address including street, city, state, and ZIP code (required)

system_type.description: HVAC system type (furnace, heat_pump, ac, etc.)

indoor_temperature_f.description: Current indoor temperature in Fahrenheit (for emergency qualification)

is_warranty.description: True if this is a warranty claim

previous_service_id.description: Previous service ID for warranty claims

previous_technician_id.description: Previous technician ID for warranty claims
